ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Restoring a deleted character
ygData.msgSnippet: What was the conclusion? You mentioned he contacted a GM , did they get the char back? Just curious Thanks ... __________________________________ Do you
ygData.messageBody:
What was the conclusion? You mentioned he contacted a
GM , did they get the char back?

Just curious

Thanks


--- apcooper <apc@...> wrote:
> Thank you very much indeed for your quick response
> :-)
>
> My son has used /petition to contact a gm and
> explained what happened.
>
> Regarding patches - how often do these occur? The
> concern is that the
> EQ autoloader downloads everything on startup. I
> assume that the data
> with respect to each character are stored on the EQ
> server and no the
> local PC?
>
> Thanks once again!
>
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Tracy Fowler"
> <wareagletsf@a...>
> wrote:
> > yes a deleted charature can be restored contact a
> gm in game and
> explain what happened and it may take a while, you
> have to do it
> before the next patch, otherwise it cant be done
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: apcooper
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 27, 2003 7:44 AM
> > Subject: [EverQuest] Restoring a deleted
> character
> >
> >
> > Please help if you can!
> >
> > My son has just accidentally deleted his best
> character, which he
> has
> > been working with for many months. Obviously he
> is most upset.
> >
> > Can the character be restored, and if so, what
> is the procedure?
> >
> > Many thanks in anticipation!
> >
